      • insertPersonalDetails

        public org.icube.hat.test.TestInfo insertPersonalDetails(int companyId,
                                                         int userId,
                                                         java.lang.String firstName,
                                                         java.lang.String middleName,
                                                         java.lang.String lastName,
                                                         java.lang.String emailId,
                                                         java.lang.String mobileNo,
                                                         int cityId,
                                                         java.lang.String aadharNo,
                                                         java.lang.String degree,
                                                         java.lang.String stream)
        Insert the personal details of the candidate
        Parameters:
        companyId - - company ID for db connection
        userId - - unique user ID for the candidate
        firstName - - first name of the candidate
        middleName - - middle name of the candidate
        lastName - - last name of the candidate
        emailId - - email address of the candidate
        mobileNo - - mobile number of the candidate
        cityId - - cityId of the candidate
        aadharNo - - aadhar number of the candidate
        degree - - degree of the candidate
        stream - - stream of the candidate
        Returns:
        test info object with the test ID and candidate name for displaying purpose

      • updateTestStatus

        public boolean updateTestStatus(int companyId,
                                int testId,
                                org.icube.hat.test.TestStatus status)
        Updates the test status of the given test ID Should be called from the UI only once all the responses are successfully saved This will also do the result calculation once the test status has been successfully updated
        Parameters:
        companyId - - company ID for db connection
        testId - - test ID for which the status needs to be updated
        status - - status to be updated
        Returns:
        boolean value if the status was successfully updated
